```{r}
#| label: setup
#| echo: false
#| message: false

library(conflicted)
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(fs)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
library(readr)
library(stringr)
library(tidyr)

# Generate ids for each link to join into schedule
resources_paths <-
  c(
    path("pre-activities"),
    path("slides"),
    path("activities"),
    path("labs")
  )

resources <-
  tibble(
    path = dir_ls(resources_paths, glob = "*.qmd"),
    id = path |> path_file() |> str_extract("(\\d+).*$", group = 1),
    type = path |> path_dir() |> str_replace("-", "_")
  ) |>
  pivot_wider(names_from = type, values_from = path)

schedule <-
  read_csv(
    here("data", "schedule.csv"),
    show_col_types = FALSE
  ) |>
  mutate(wday = wday(date, label = TRUE, abbr = TRUE), .after = date) |>
  left_join(resources, by = join_by(id), na_matches = "never")
```

```{r}
#| label: schedule
#| echo: false

schedule |>
  relocate(
    pre_activities,
    slides,
    activities,
    workspace,
    labs,
    .after = topic
  ) |>
  gt(groupname_col = "part") |>
  fmt_date(
    date,
    date_style = "MMMd"
  ) |>
  sub_missing(
    missing_text = ""
  ) |>
  fmt_url(
    columns = pre_activities,
    label = fa("list-check")
  ) |>
  sub_missing(
    columns = pre_activities,
    missing_text = fa("list-check", fill_opacity = 0.1)
  ) |>
  fmt_url(
    columns = slides,
    label = fa("window-maximize")
  ) |>
  sub_missing(
    columns = slides,
    missing_text = fa("window-maximize", fill_opacity = 0.1)
  ) |>
  fmt_url(
    columns = labs,
    label = fa("laptop-code")
  ) |>
  sub_missing(
    columns = labs,
    missing_text = fa("laptop-code", fill_opacity = 0.1)
  ) |>
  fmt_url(
    columns = activities,
    label = fa("file-alt")
  ) |>
  sub_missing(
    columns = activities,
    missing_text = fa("file-alt", fill_opacity = 0.1)
  ) |>
  fmt_url(
    columns = social,
    label = fa("padlet")
  ) |>
  sub_missing(
    columns = social,
    missing_text = fa("padlet", fill_opacity = 0.1)
  ) |>
  cols_hide(
    columns = c(id, workspace)
  ) |>
  cols_label(
    module = "Module",
    date = "Date",
    wday = "Day",
    topic = "Topic",
    pre_activities = "Pre",
    slides = "Slides",
    labs = "Lab",
    activities = "Activity",
    social = "Social"
  ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      cell_text(weight = "bold")
    ),
    locations = list(
      cells_row_groups(),
      cells_stubhead(),
      cells_column_labels()
    )
  ) |>
  gt_highlight_rows(
    row = date == "2023-11-30",
    fill = "#ccefff"
  ) |>
  tab_options(
    quarto.disable_processing = TRUE
  )
```
